about_the_game:
It is a pixelated agile game presented in fresh light tones. The game adopts soft and bright pixel elements to create a unique dreamy scene, and players move forward on a track composed of countless colorful pixel columns. The game controls are simple and easy to learn, just use the space bar flexibly to control the character's jumping, and accurately traverse pillars with varying distances.

Accompanied by a relaxed and enjoyable electronic music melody, players will dance gracefully in the air, and each precise jump will receive clear and pleasant sound effects. The core gameplay of the game is to test the player's reaction speed and sense of rhythm. The more pillars they successfully cross, the higher their score. They constantly challenge their limits and break ranking records. This game that combines leisure and entertainment with competitive challenges will surely make you love it.
